pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, December 11, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Minister of Environment and Climate Change Jonathan Wilkinson, Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna, and Minister of Canadian Heritage Steven Guilbeault. A media availability will follow.

Dominion Arboretum
Building 74, Central Experimental Farm
(east side of roundabout on Prince of Wales Drive)

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
